casebody.data:
Christopher P. STARK
v.
Janaki RATASHARA-STARK. No. 353P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. Christopher Paul Stark, Pro Se. R. Michael Bruce, Danbury, for Ratashara-Stark.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 15th day of October 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for Petition in the Nature of a Petition to Vacate a Void Judgment and Collateral Attack, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of December 2004."
